EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
1. VESSEL, 300 PERSONS ON BOARD, REQUESTING
   ASSISTANCE IN 32-49N 012-39E AT 270515Z JAN.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
   SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
   PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409,
   FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
   E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 282/17.
